Divine Strike: Necrotic

Once per turn deal 1d8 Necrotic Damage in addition to your weapon's damage when you make a melee attack.

Death Domain Lv 10

Throw a creature or object that is Medium-sized or smaller.

Heavier creatures and objects deal more damage on impact.

Must be Enraged.

Elemental Cleaver
